verses.text: \w Cast|strong="H7971"\w* thy \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*: for thou shalt \w find|strong="H4672"\w* it after \w many|strong="H7230"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 11.1 \ft upon…: Heb. upon the face of the waters\f*

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* a \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* to \w seven|strong="H7651"\w*, and also to \w eight|strong="H8083"\w*; for thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* not what \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* shall be upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

If the \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* be \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*, they \w empty|strong="H7324"\w* \add themselves\add* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: and if the \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* toward the \w south|strong="H1864"\w*, or toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where the \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w falleth|strong="H5307"\w*, there it shall \w be|strong="H1933"\w*.

He that \w observeth|strong="H8104"\w* the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* shall not \w sow|strong="H2232"\w*; and he that \w regardeth|strong="H7200"\w* the \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* shall not \w reap|strong="H7114"\w*.

As thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* not what \add is\add* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, \add nor\add* how the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \add do grow\add* in the \w womb|strong="H0990"\w* of her that is with \w child|strong="H4392"\w*: even so thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* not the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* who \w maketh|strong="H6213"\w* all.

In the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, and in the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w withhold|strong="H3240"\w* not thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: for thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* not \w whether|strong="H0335"\w* shall \w prosper|strong="H3787"\w*, either this or that, or whether they \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \add shall be\add* \w alike|strong="H0259"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.\f + \fr 11.6 \ft shall prosper: Heb. shall be right\f*

¶ Truly the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \add is\add* \w sweet|strong="H4966"\w*, and a \w pleasant|strong="H2896"\w* \add thing it is\add* for the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* to \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*:

But if a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \add and\add* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in them all; yet let him \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*; for they shall be \w many|strong="H7235"\w*. All that \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* \add is\add* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*.

¶ \w Rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, O young \w man|strong="H0970"\w*, in thy \w youth|strong="H3208"\w*; and let thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w cheer|strong="H2895"\w* thee in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w youth|strong="H0979"\w*, and \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* in the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and in the \w sight|strong="H4758"\w* of thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: but \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thou, that for all these \add things\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thee into \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

Therefore \w remove|strong="H5493"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H3708"\w* from thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and put \w away|strong="H5674"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* from thy \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*: for \w childhood|strong="H3208"\w* and \w youth|strong="H7839"\w* \add are\add* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*.\f + \fr 11.10 \ft sorrow: or, anger\f*
